TEXT: The applicant , Mr Pavlo Volodymyrovych Soloshenko , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE , the ORG region , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG against ORG , seeking recovery of food allowance arrears ( an extraordinary compensation for food expenses ) for the period from DATE until DATE , to which he was entitled having been a relief worker during the CARDINAL Chernobyl Nuclear Plant disaster . On DATE the court ordered the department to pay the applicant ORG CARDINAL in compensation .
On DATE the court issued a writ of execution for the judgment .
On DATE the same court granted the department an extension of the time - limit for lodging its appeal against the judgment . The applicant did not appeal against that decision .
On DATE the ORG upheld the judgment of DATE . The decision of CARDINAL DATE was not appealed in cassation .
On DATE the applicant submitted to ORG the writ of execution for the judgement of DATE , seeking initiation of the enforcement proceedings .

On DATE ORG postponed initiation of those proceedings on the ground that the writ of execution did not contain information about the debtor ’s bank accounts . It sent the writ to ORG for corrections to be made by DATE .
According to the Government , ORG issued another writ in respect of the judgment at issue on DATE .
On DATE ORG instituted enforcement proceedings .
On DATE ORG discontinued the enforcement proceedings in the light of the full execution of the judgment of DATE .
